loggedIn.title: You are already logged in
loggedIn.description: To access this page, you need to log out first.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.description: Enter your credentials to access your account.

signup.title: Create an Account
signup.description: Enter your information to get started.
signup.successDescription: Welcome! We are redirecting you to the dashboard.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
forgotPassword.description: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions.
forgotPassword.submittedDescription: If an account with that email exists, we've sent a password reset link.

error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
error.nameRequired: Name must be at least 2 characters.
error.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
error.emailInUse: This email address is already in use.
error.invalidCredentials: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
error.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

hero.title: Simplify Your Business Management
hero.subtitle: Enterprisy Lite offers the tools you need to easily manage products, orders, and customers. Focus on growth, we'll handle the rest.

benefits.title: Everything You Need for Success
benefits.subtitle: Our platform is designed to optimize your workflow and boost your productivity.

benefit1.title: Intuitive Dashboard
benefit1.description: Clear view of your business with essential metrics and analysis.

benefit2.title: Product Management
benefit2.description: Add, edit, and organize your products simply and effectively.

benefit3.title: Order Control
benefit3.description: Manage orders, update statuses, and track your sales funnel.

benefit4.title: AI-Powered Descriptions
benefit4.description: Save time by generating attractive product descriptions with our AI.

pricing.title: Find the Perfect Plan for You
pricing.subtitle: Start for free and scale as you grow. No credit card required.

free.name: Free
free.description: For individuals and small teams just starting out.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: For growing businesses that need more power.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large-scale operations with custom needs.

footer.copy: Â© {year} Enterprisy Lite. All rights reserved.

empty.title: No products yet
empty.description: Your products will appear here. Get started by adding your first product.

empty.title: No orders to show
empty.description: When you receive new orders, they will appear here.

generateSuccess.title: Description Generated!
generateSuccess.description: The AI has generated a new product description.
